fr.inria.atlanmod.commons.io.serializer

Interface StringSerializer<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of (de)serialized objects
    All Superinterfaces:
    Converter<T,java.lang.String>, java.util.function.Function<T,java.lang.String>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStringSerializer

    @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public interface StringSerializer<T>
extends Converter<T,java.lang.String>
    An object that is responsible of Object to String encoding and decoding.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default java.lang.String convert(T t)
      Returns a representation of t as an instance of type R.
      T deserialize(java.lang.String data)
      Reads and assembles an object of type T from the given string.
      default T revert(java.lang.String data)
      Returns a representation of r as an instance of type T.
      java.lang.String serialize(T t)
      Write an object of type T as a String.
